name: Microwave Oven Samsung /BW (MC28H5013AK)
origAbout: Samsung Smart Oven MC28H5013 offers 15 delicious and healthy auto-recipes for healthy eating. Convection mode allows you to quickly and easily prepare juicy and appetizing meals. Enjoy the ability to quickly and easily prepare homemade dough and yoghurt using the latest fermentation technology. The bio ceramic coating, which covers the inner walls of the working chamber of the Samsung Smart Oven MC28H5013AW oven, has a smooth surface that is easily and quickly cleaned of traces of burnt fat. The BIO Ceramic Camera is antibacterial and scratch resistant.
